trans-unit.source: Configures the SQL cache dependencies databases for an ASP.NET application.
This class cannot be inherited.

The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase> allows you to programmatically access and modify the `databases` element of the `sqlCacheDependency` node within the `caching` configuration section.
The SQL cache dependency allows the cached data to be synchronized with the original source.

After you configure the relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table, an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> class monitors the table for possible changes.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> class with the passed parameters.
A string that specifies the name used by <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> to identify the database.
A string that specifies the name of the connection string in the `connectionStrings` section to use to connect to this database.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> class.
A string that specifies the name used by <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> to identify the database.
A string that specifies the name of the connection string in the `connectionStrings` section to use to connect to this database.
The database polling time, in milliseconds.
Gets or sets the connection name for the database.

The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase.ConnectionStringName%2A> property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `connectionName` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file.
The connection name identifies an element in the `connectionStrings` section which contains the database connection string.
A string that specifies the name of a database connection string within the `connectionStrings` configuration section.
Gets or sets the name of the database.

The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase.Name%2A> property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `name` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file.
The `name` attribute identifies the database whose table is used for the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency>.
A string that specifies the name used by <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase"></xref> to identify the database.
Gets or sets the frequency with which the <xref href="System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency"></xref> polls the database table for changes.

The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase.PollTime%2A> property allows you to programmatically access and modify the `pollTime` attribute of an `add` element of the `databases` node in a configuration file.

After you configure the relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table, an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> class monitors the table so that when an item in the table changes, the item is automatically updated in or removed from the cache.
The monitoring happens at the frequency specified by the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencyDatabase.PollTime%2A>.
The database polling time, in milliseconds.
